caller_intent: The caller (Jelica) is seeking assistance with renewing a home insurance policy, clarifying the roof's installation year, and exploring potential bundling options with auto insurance to secure better rates.
resolution_steps: Agent Brandy confirms the policy renewal date and notes the August renewal deadline.
Discusses roof year confusion (2006 vs. 2016) and clarifies with the caller that the roof was installed in 2006 but replaced in 2022.
Requests documentation (receipts/invoices) from the roofing company to verify the 2022 roof replacement for rate adjustments.
Promises to send a home insurance quote by Thursday, contingent on receiving the roof proof.
Mentions potential bundling of home and auto insurance for additional savings.
knowledge_required: Impact of roof age on insurance rates
Bundling strategies for home and auto policies
summary: Brandy from Alliance Insurance follows up on a home insurance renewal, clarifies roof installation dates, and requests proof of a 2022 roof replacement to secure better rates. She will send a quote by Thursday once documentation is provided, with potential bundling options discussed.
